feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: The origin of COVID
entry.content:
Post 191385 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This post will likely cause harm and the intention/aim is ambiguous. Also, the mentioned source is a known scientific racist, I do not see much productive conversation/good coming from this. -- travelingthyme
entry.summary: Post 191385 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This post will likely cause harm and the intention/aim is ambiguous. Also, the mentioned source is a known scientific racist, I do not see much productive conversation/good coming from this. -- travelingthyme

This post was deleted for the following reason: Since this isn't actually linking to an article or similar, but is just announcing the book is out, the best thing to do is go ahead and post the book to Fanfare, where people will definitely enjoy talking about it! (If there are reviews or similar later, something like that would be totally fine for the Blue) -- taz
